# modeltime.ensemble

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A `modeltime` extension that that implements ensemble forecasting methods including model averaging, weighted averaging via penalized regression, and stacking.

## Installation

``` r
devtools::install_github("business-science/modeltime.ensemble")
```
